dashboard.description: Your safety-focused medical AI assistant. How can I help you today?

xray.title: X-Ray Analysis
xray.description: Upload an X-ray to get an educational analysis.

report.title: Report Interpretation
report.description: Paste a medical report for a simplified explanation.

symptoms.title: Symptom Checker
symptoms.description: Describe your symptoms for informational guidance.

chat.title: Medical AI Chat
chat.description: Ask health-related questions in a supportive chat.

chat.title: Medical AI Chat
chat.description: Ask your health-related questions in a safe and supportive space.
chat.initialMessage: Hello! I am MediaID AI. How can I assist you with your health questions today?
chat.errorMessage: Failed to get a response from the AI. Please try again.

emergency.title: Potential Emergency Detected
emergency.description: Based on your input, your situation may require immediate medical attention.
emergency.advice: Please do not delay seeking care. Contact your local emergency services, go to the nearest emergency room, or consult a healthcare professional immediately.

report.title: Medical Report Interpretation
report.description: Paste your medical report below to get a simplified, easy-to-understand explanation.
report.placeholder: Paste the full text of your medical report here...
report.validationError: Medical report text must be at least 20 characters.
report.analyzingDescription: Please wait while our AI interprets your report.
report.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is not a professional medical diagnosis and should be used for informational purposes only. Always consult with a licensed doctor or qualified healthcare provider for any medical concerns.

symptoms.title: Symptom-Based Guidance
symptoms.description: Describe your symptoms to receive a list of possible causes for informational purposes.

form.symptomsPlaceholder: e.g., 'I have a persistent cough, slight fever, and feel very tired.'
form.symptomsValidationError: Please describe your symptoms in at least 10 characters.

symptoms.disclaimer: Disclaimer: MediaID AI provides educational and informational health insights only. This is not a professional medical diagnosis and must not be used as a substitute for consultation, diagnosis, or treatment by a licensed doctor or qualified healthcare provider.

xray.title: X-Ray & Imaging Analysis
xray.description: Upload an X-ray image for an educational analysis. This tool is for informational purposes only.

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Drop your X-ray image here or click to upload.
upload.dragInactive: Drag 'n' drop an image, or click to select

analysis.analyzingDescription: Our AI is looking at your image. This may take a moment.
